ViewObject.Name: MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderVOExSetParent
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT DISTINCT MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.HEADER_ID, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.ORGANIZATION, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.ORG_ID, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.DEPARTMENT, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.ITEM_NAME, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.ITEM_CODE, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.ITEM_DESCRIPTION, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.QTY, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.VERSION_NO, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.VERSION_DATE, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.RESP_ID, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.USER_ID, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.CREATION_DATE, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.CREATED_BY, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.LAST_UPDATED_BY, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.WARRANTY_START_DATE, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.WARRANTY_END_DATE, ROUND ( (MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.WARRANTY_END_DATE - SYSDATE)) Remaining_Warranty_Days, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.WARRANTY_CARD, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.INVOICE, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.PURCHASE_DATE, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.PURCHASE_PRICE, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.SUPPLIER_NAME, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.TOTAL_AMOUNT, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.BRAND_NAME, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.WARRANTY_MONTHS, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.PREFIX_ITEM, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.FIXED_ASSET_TAG_ID, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.GRN, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.PR, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.SPO, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.ITEM_ID, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.PRODUCT_SERIAL_NO, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.PRODUCT_ID, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.GRN_DATE, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.WARRANTY_ID, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.UNIT, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.BILL_NO, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.UOM, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.BILL_DATE, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.PRODUCT_USER, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.WARRANTY_REMAINING_DAYS, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.REPLACEMENT_DATE, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.LOCATION, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.VENDOR_ID, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.PO_LINE_ID, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.PO_HEADER_ID, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.WARRANTY_TAG, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.WARRANTY_TYPE, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.WARRANTY_ITEM_SERIAL_NUMBER, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.ITEM_CATEGORY, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.ITEM_CATEGORY_ID, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.ITEM_CATEGORY_SHORT, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.ITEM_SUB_CATEGORY, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.ITEM_SUB_CATEGORY_ID, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.ITEM_SUB_CATEGORY_SHORT, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.SUB_LOCATION, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.PARENT_ITEM_HEADER_ID, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.PARENT_ITEM_WARRANTY_TAG, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.CHILD_EXISTS_FLAG, (SELECT COUNT (*) FROM (SELECT ROWNUM FROM MNJ_WARRANTY_MANAGEMENT_LINE Li WHERE 1 = 1 AND MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.header_id = Li.header_id AND MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.CHILD_EXISTS_FLAG = 'Yes')) Line_Table_Row_Num, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.REMARKS, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.PRODUCT_USER_EMP_ID, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.PRODUCT_USER_DEPT, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.COST_CENTER, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.COST_CENTER_NAME, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.SCHEDULE_MAINTAIN_FLAG, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.WARRANTY_START_DATE Maintenance_Start_From, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.MAINTAIN_PERIOD, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.LAST_MAINTAIN_DATE, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.NEXT_MAINTAIN_DATE, ROUND ( (MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.NEXT_MAINTAIN_DATE - SYSDATE)) Rem_Days_For_Next_Main, MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.WARRANTY_TAG_YEAR FROM MNJ_WARRANTY_MANAGEMENT_HEADER MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1, MNJ_WARRANTY_MANAGEMENT_LINE L WHERE MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.header_id = L.header_id(+) /** Added P_Resp_Id by Sakibul Islam on 02.09.2020 **/ and (((:P_Resp_Id = '50821') and MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.ORG_ID = 342) --50821 --> GFL or ((:P_Resp_Id = '50822') and MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.ORG_ID = 344) --50822 --> GWL or ((:P_Resp_Id = '20634') and MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.ORG_ID in (340,341,342,343,344,526,527))) --20634-->Corporate Office and MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.parent_item_warranty_tag is null ORDER BY MnjWarrantyManagementHeaderE1.HEADER_ID DESC
